original: The artifacts on display at the Lords’ Ball were protected by layers of abjuration spells. Even a highly skilled mage would have trouble breaking into them.\n\nThe spells that guard the displays can be temporarily disabled using a spoken password. Harold Haroldson is supposedly the only person who knows this password.
translation: 勋爵的舞会上展出的遗物都施加了多层防护法术。顶尖法师也要费一番功夫才能突破。\n\n特定的口述密码可以暂时禁用这些法术。哈罗德·哈罗德森理应是唯一知晓密码的人。
